steps.name: Select the specific mobile, print name , size , colour and Top 3 question and answer
Add the item to the cart, put assertion on the product added to cart.
Navigate to Shopping Cart button, increase the order Quantity to 4.
Verify the item quantity inside the cart and list the total amount for the order.
